pullrequest.title: Fix order of adding and removing rendering entities

content.raw:
The reason Ian made pr #416 target `add_remove_scene_entities` is because pr #416 is based on a branch that had the changes in `add_remove_scene_entities`. So, if he made pr #416 target `ign-gazebo2` instead of the `add_remove_scene_entities` branch, then pr #416 would have a diff that included both sets of changes.

If we merged #415 first, then we can re-target #416 to `ign-gazebo2`. This is the cleanest order of operations.
If we merge #416 into `add_remove_scene_entities` first, then pull request #416 will include all the changes and the diff becomes worse. 
The third and final option, which is what happened here, it to wait for 2-approvals on both PRs. Then we can merge #416, followed by #415.
